definition: to circle/to go back/to turn around/to answer/to return/to revolve/Hui ethnic group (Chinese Muslims)/time/classifier for acts of a play/section or chapter (of a classic book)

sentences.english: The crests of the gyri are most susceptible to the traumatic forces.
sentences.chinese: 腦回頂部容易受到創傷外力的打擊。

sentences.english: A coronal section through the frontal lobes reveals extensive contusions involving the inferior gyri.
sentences.chinese: 額葉冠狀面顯示累及下方腦回的廣泛挫傷。
